pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non-Parametric Trend Tests and Change-Point Detection // The analysis of environmental data often requires the detection of trends and change-points. This package provides the Mann- Kendall Trend Test, seasonal Mann-Kendall Test, correlated seasonal Mann-Kendall Test, partial Mann-Kendall Trend test, (Seasonal) Sen's slope, partial correlation trend test and change-point test after Pettitt.
